All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiKeyException
Custom exception class used to indicate issues related to API Key validation or authorization.
Author
Model representing an academic author retrieved from an external API (SerpAPI).
AuthorController
Class that currently has only one Endpoint (GET) DATE: 04 - October - 2025
AuthorNotFoundException
Custom exception thrown when an author with the specified ID cannot be found.
AuthorSearchResponse
Model representing the response structure from the external API when searching for an author.
AuthorService
Service class responsible for retrieving author data from an external API (e.g., SerpAPI).
Error
Model representing a standardized error response structure for the API.
ExternalApiException
Custom exception thrown when an error occurs while communicating with an external API.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for the Researcher Data Integration API.
Interest
Model representing a research interest or topic associated with an author.
ResearcherDataIntegrationApplication
Main entry point for the Researcher Data Integration application.
RestTemplateConfig
Class to config the API REST creating a RESTTemplate.
ScholarApiConfiguration
Class to create an object to get the application properties.
